notes.text:
This update for python-wheel fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-40898: Fixed an excessive use of CPU that could be triggered
  via a crafted regular expression (bsc#1206670).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue discovered in Python Packaging Authority (PyPA) Wheel 0.37.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via attacker controlled input to wheel cli.
notes.title: CVE description
